registry.meta:
Data Forms Validation Datatypes &LEGALNOTICE; This is the official registry of datatypes for use in the context of &xep0122;, as maintained by the ®ISTRAR;. This registry contains datatypes specified in XEP-0122 as well as datatypes submitted directly to the XMPP Registrar.
0.2 2005-08-26 psa Added sipub:file-transfer type specified in XEP-0137.
0.1 2004-09-22 psa Initial version with parameters specified in XEP-0122.

datatype.name: sipub:file-transfer
datatype.desc: Datatype for publishing an SI using the File Transfer Profile

datatype.name: xs:byte
datatype.desc: an integer with the specified min/max

datatype.name: xs:double
datatype.desc: an IEEE double-precision 64-bit floating point type

datatype.name: xs:int
datatype.desc: an integer with the specified min/max

datatype.name: xs:integer
datatype.desc: a decimal number with no fraction digits

datatype.name: xs:language
datatype.desc: a language identifier as defined by RFC 1766

datatype.name: xs:long
datatype.desc: an integer with the specified min/max

datatype.name: xs:short
datatype.desc: an integer with the specified min/max

datatype.name: xs:time
datatype.desc: an instant of time that recurs every day
